body_html:
@jhseu I considered it, but right now this version is not directly compatible with master or v1.8-rc0, and as I describe in the commit, it contains breaking changes and is not suitable for a merge, so I would say its better to leave it here for any TF user who needs full C++ Tensorflow on Android and has reasons to avoid the makefile contrib.
If you take a guick gander at the patch and read through my comment above, is there anything you'd have a use for in master and would like me to provide a separate patch for?

body:
@jhseu I considered it, but right now this version is not directly compatible with master or v1.8-rc0, and as I describe in the commit, it contains breaking changes and is not suitable for a merge, so I would say its better to leave it here for any TF user who needs full C++ Tensorflow on Android and has reasons to avoid the makefile contrib.
If you take a guick gander at the patch and read through my comment above, is there anything you'd have a use for in master and would like me to provide a separate patch for?
